definitions.title: n.[m.] provision, food
definitions.body: ;—abs. [[חָֽיִד]] Ne 13:15; sf. [[חֵידוֹ]] Job 38:41, etc.;—provision taken on journey Jos 9:14, [[לֶחֶם חֵירָם]] v:Jos 9:5 (both JE); more gen. (late). food, food-supply, Ne 13:15. Ps 132:15, of raven Job 38:41.—I. [[חַיִד]] v. [[חוד]] p. 844
